metformin.title: Metformin Strategic Roadmap 2025
key_takeaways: Focus on emerging markets where diabetes prevalence is rising
Explore fixed-dose combinations with SGLT2 inhibitors
Defend market share against generic erosion

metformin.title: Field Insights: Metformin Adoption in NAFLD
key_takeaways: HCPs are prescribing off-label for pre-diabetes and NAFLD
Patient adherence issues due to gastrointestinal side effects
Request for sustained release formulations in lower doses

metformin.title: Metformin Clinical Summary (NAFLD)
key_takeaways: Modest weight loss observed in non-diabetic obese patients
Liver enzyme improvement in 40% of subjects
No safety signals in long-term usage

keytruda.title: Keytruda Lifecycle Management Strategy
key_takeaways: Prioritize adjuvant indications in early-stage cancers
Develop subcutaneous formulation to extend patent life
Combination strategy with novel TIGIT inhibitors

keytruda.title: Competitor Analysis: PD-1/L1 Landscape
key_takeaways: Opdivo losing share in 1L NSCLC
Tecentriq aggressive in SCLC
BeiGene pricing pressure in China market

humira.title: Humira Biosimilar Defense Plan
key_takeaways: Maximize conversion to High Concentration formulation
Payer contracting strategies to maintain formulary status
Volume share erosion expected to be 20-30% in Year 1

humira.title: Sales Force Feedback Q4 2023
key_takeaways: Dermatologists stickier to brand than Rheumatologists
Patients prefer the citrate-free injection experience
